title: Luisa Zissman shows off her impressive flexibility as she jumps into the splits on the dancefloor
text:
Luisa Zissman was in party mode as she did the splits on the dancefloor at Sam Faiers' Quiz collection launch at Hedsor House in Buckinghamshire on Wednesday.

The Apprentice star, 32, showed off her impressive flexibility as she jumped into the front splits while larking around with Sam's sister Billie.

Luisa certainly caught the eye as she slipped into a busty silk black corset minidress.

Wild side: Luisa Zissman was in party mode as she did the splits on the dancefloor at Sam Faiers' Quiz collection launch at Hedsor House in Buckinghamshire on Wednesday

Luisa opted to shun the cardinal legs-or-cleavage rule in favour of full on glamour, with the thigh-skimming dress highlighting her ample assets due to its plunging neckline.

The silver corset with buckle detailing accentuated her slender waist, while her metallic paint splattered shoes added a boost to her petite frame.

She wore her brunette locks in tumbled curls and finished off her party outfit with a glamorous make-up look.

Glamorous: Luisa certainly caught the eye as she slipped into a busty silk black corset minidress

Worse-for-wear: The Apprentice star, 32, showed off her impressive flexibility as she jumped into the front splits while larking around with Sam's sister Billie

Luisa and Sam have become firm friends over the years and the Mummy Diaries star couldn't resist showing Luisa's racy dance moves during the raucous bash.

Taking to Instagram, Sam shared a video of Billie and Luisa on the dancefloor with the Apprentice star proceeding to play up for the camera by performing the splits and then going into a backwards roly-poly.

Luisa's night out comes after she had a breast reduction, five years after having implants where she boosted her chest size from a 32C to a 32E.

Busty: Luisa opted to shun the cardinal legs-or-cleavage rule in favour of full on glamour, with the thigh-skimming dress highlighting her ample assets due to its plunging neckline

Killer curves: The silver corset with buckle detailing accentuated her slender waist, while her metallic paint splattered shoes added a boost to her petite frame

Dressed to impress: She wore her brunette locks in tumbled curls and finished off her party outfit with a glamorous make-up look

Girls' night: Clutching a cocktail in hand, Luisa later changed into black silk pjamas and slippers

Taking to Instagram, she shared a lengthy series of clips detailing why she opted for the reduction, admitting she wasn't prepared for the fact that her breasts would grow bigger after the birth of her children.

After undergoing the £15,000 reduction surgery, the businesswoman explained: 'I had my implants out. No more big boobies! I was sick of them, I was sick of looking like a Love Island porn star.

'I actually feel ok, I'm not really in that much pain but I was in hospital since Saturday and I was like out of it. Now I have no t**s, they look tiny'.

The mother-of-three divorced first husband Oliver Zissman in 2014 after five years of marriage and tied the knot with Irish businessman Andrew Collins in July 2015.
description: Luisa Zissman was in party mode as she did the splits on the dancefloor at Sam Faiers' Quiz  collection launch at Hedsor House in Buckinghamshire on Wednesday.
